test module¶

test.KinKmeans(var, nk=False, tol=0.0001, n_init=100)¶
test.cclimatology(var, time, relative=False, smooth=False, window=15, israin=False)¶

Calculates the daily climatology (time = 365/6 days) and the anomaly in relation to that climatology

var : numpy
Array with data (usualy time, lat, lon)
time : list
containing the datetime for var
relative : bool
True retuns relative anomaly
smooth : bool
True smooths climatology with runing mean
window : int
Window for running mean
israin : bool
True for rain data (uses sum instead of mean)
numpy
Array with daily climatology and anomaly
clim, anl = cclimatology(var, timei, **kwargs)
test.eof(var, neof=30, dim='field')¶
test.runmean(x, N)¶
test.svd(var1, var2, neof)¶
